label: CPL Dark Energy Parameterization w(z)
mathematical_goal: Evaluate CPL dark energy equation of state w(z) at pivot redshift z=0.45
theoretical_significance: The CPL (Chevallier-Polarski-Linder) parameterization w(z) = w0 + wa*z/(1+z) describes dark energy evolution. With PM's geometric predictions w0 = -23/24 and wa = -0.204 (base), the equation of state at z=0.45 is w(0.45) ~ -1.02, slightly phantom. This evolves from phantom (w < -1) at high z toward quintessence (w > -1) at low z.

evolution.interpretation: Thawing quintessence from phantom at early times
